meanings.definition: Having ten sides and ten angles.
meanings.sent1: The decagonal shape of the playground made it stand out from the rest.
meanings.sent2: The decagonal table in the room added a unique touch to the decor.
meanings.sent3: The decagonal pizza my brother made looked more like a star than a circle.
meanings.sent4: Her decagonal personality shone brightly in a world of squares and circles.
meanings.sent5: The decagonal pattern on the rug was mesmerizing, drawing everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A polygon with ten sides and ten angles.
meanings.sent1: The children learned about the decagonal in their geometry class.
meanings.sent2: The decagonal on the flag represented unity and strength.
meanings.sent3: The decagonal on the soccer field confused the players, making them run in circles.
meanings.sent4: The decagonal of trees in the park created a natural boundary.
meanings.sent5: The decagonal of mirrors in the funhouse created a dizzying effect.
